version.description: The version of this timetabler data file.

classes.description: An array of all the classes forming the timetable

type.description: The type of class it is, e.g. 'Lecture', or 'Workshop'

color.description: The color to show on the timetable

options.description: An array containing each possible scheduling option. Can contain strings, or arrays of strings if multiple time slots come as a group. Strings must be in the format 'day time duration [online?]', e.g. 'mon 13:00 2h' or 'fri 8pm 90m online'.

anyOf.description: Details about this time option. Strings must be in the format 'day time duration [online?]', e.g. 'mon 13:00 2h' or 'fri 8pm 90m online'.
An array containing each slot in this group. Strings must be in the format 'day time duration [online?]', e.g. 'mon 13:00 2h' or 'fri 8pm 90m online'.

items.description: Details about this time slot in this group. Strings must be in the format 'day time duration [online?]', e.g. 'mon 13:00 2h' or 'fri 8pm 90m online'.

optional.description: True, if not adding the class to the timetable is an option. Defaults to false if not provided.
